DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study quantify amount corneal stain observe various market contact lens/multipurpose solution combination . The hypothesis measurable difference amount corneal stain various combination .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Corneal Staining With Various Contact Lens/Solution Combinations
DOC.detailed_description: A series clinical study conduct one research site use double-masked , randomized cross-over design . Each study consist asymptomatic daily wear soft contact lens wearer observe baseline two four hour post lens insertion . Corneal stain assess use sodium fluorescein , cobalt filter yellow filter . Subjective comfort assessment obtain visit .
